name: Design and technology
aboutCourse: This course is intended for trainees who wish to specialise in design and technology but to work in a middle schools setting with the ability to teach the broader curriculum areas in Key Stage 2 and 3.
interviewProcess: As part of the interview process, applicants will be expected to teach a mini lesson to 6 students in the middle school setting, which will be observed by teachers from both the middle school, Cleeve training hub and the University.  Additionally, applicants will have an interview with this panel to ensure their suitability for the course.
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
There will be 2 placements as part of this course

1, Sept-Dec
2, Jan-June

Both placements will take place in middle schools, with additional brief schools experience in secondary and primary settings to complement and allow a breadth of experience of age ranges.

Training will be weekly on Fridays in Cleeve Training Hub throughout the course.
